post.description: Checks what restrictions Azure Policy will place on a resource within a subscription.

200.description: The restrictions that will be placed on the resource by Azure Policy.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Checks what restrictions Azure Policy will place on a resource within a resource group. Use this when the resource group the resource will be created in is already known.

200.description: The restrictions that will be placed on the resource by Azure Policy.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

CheckRestrictionsRequest.description: The check policy restrictions parameters describing the resource that is being evaluated.

resourceDetails.description: The information about the resource that will be evaluated.

pendingFields.description: The list of fields and values that should be evaluated for potential restrictions.

CheckRestrictionsResourceDetails.description: The information about the resource that will be evaluated.

resourceContent.description: The resource content. This should include whatever properties are already known and can be a partial set of all resource properties.

apiVersion.description: The api-version of the resource content.

scope.description: The scope where the resource is being created. For example, if the resource is a child resource this would be the parent resource's resource ID.

PendingField.description: A field that should be evaluated against Azure Policy to determine restrictions.

field.description: The name of the field. This can be a top-level property like 'name' or 'type' or an Azure Policy field alias.

values.description: The list of potential values for the field that should be evaluated against Azure Policy.

CheckRestrictionsResult.description: The result of a check policy restrictions evaluation on a resource.

fieldRestrictions.description: The restrictions that will be placed on various fields in the resource by policy.

contentEvaluationResult.description: Evaluation results for the provided partial resource content.

policyEvaluations.description: Policy evaluation results against the given resource content. This will indicate if the partial content that was provided will be denied as-is.

FieldRestrictions.description: The restrictions that will be placed on a field in the resource by policy.

field.description: The name of the field. This can be a top-level property like 'name' or 'type' or an Azure Policy field alias.

restrictions.description: The restrictions placed on that field by policy.

FieldRestriction.description: The restrictions on a field imposed by a specific policy.

result.description: The type of restriction that is imposed on the field.

values.description: The field and/or values are required by policy.
The field will be removed by policy.
The field and/or values will be denied by policy.

defaultValue.description: The value that policy will set for the field if the user does not provide a value.

values.description: The values that policy either requires or denies for the field.

policy.description: The details of the policy that is causing the field restriction.

PolicyEvaluationResult.description: The result of a non-compliant policy evaluation against the given resource content.

policyInfo.description: The details of the policy that was evaluated.

evaluationResult.description: The result of the policy evaluation against the resource. This will typically be 'NonCompliant' but may contain other values if errors were encountered.

evaluationDetails.description: The detailed results of the policy expressions and values that were evaluated.

policyDefinitionId.description: The resource identifier of the policy definition.

policySetDefinitionId.description: The resource identifier of the policy set definition.

policyDefinitionReferenceId.description: The reference identifier of a specific policy definition within a policy set definition.

policyAssignmentId.description: The resource identifier of the policy assignment.
